resources.string: He is a scientist of the T.I.A. Although he has demonstrated knowledge in all possible fields, his inventions have often failed.
Skills: Create inventions that dont work
An agent of the T.I.A. expert in disguises, capable of transforming into anything to solve cases.
The boss of Mortadelo at the T.I.A. Although he is a bit serious, he has to deal with the disasters caused by Mortadelo and Bacterio.
Skills: Maintain order in the T.I.A.
Secretary of the T.I.A., known for her strong character and little patience with agents, especially Mortadelo and Filemón.
Skills: Administrative management and limited patience
The superintendent of the T.I.A., in charge of assigning missions to Mortadelo and Filemón. He always ends up exasperated by the disasters they cause.
Skills: Leadership in the T.I.A. and stress resistance
A hero with superpowers like Superman, but clumsier and with everyday problems. He fights villains and faces absurd challenges.
Skills: Strength, flight, X-ray vision, but with clumsiness and variable luck
A small and extremely myopic man who always ends up in confusing and comical situations due to not seeing well what is in front of him.
Skills: Confusion and involuntary chaos due to his poor eyesight
He is a clumsy secret agent who always finds himself in comical and problematic situations. His incompetence often results in unexpected solutions.
Skills: Ability to get into trouble, but always manages to get out of it.
welcome to the world of comics
Change the language of the app between English or Spanish.
